Ξ×ρ.Ξ∘ρ: Apply meta-symmetry to layer chains (permutations, reflections, fractal replication).
Ξ×ρ.ρ∘Ξ: Layer structure after symmetry-lifted operators are placed.
Ξ×ρ.role: Define symmetry classes of layer hierarchies.

effects: Swap roles (e.g., δ↔Φ, Φ↔Π, Π↔δ) when allowed.
Ξ×Tri-Unity.role: Study of global symmetries of the Tri-Unity algebra.

Ξ×δΦΠμλψΣΘχΩ.Ξ\_dual: Dualize operators (adjoints, reciprocal weights, time reversals, etc.).
Ξ×δΦΠμλψΣΘχΩ.Ξ\_fractal: Replicate a pattern across scales and layers.

Ξ×module\_packs.Ξ∘tier\_n\_module\_pack: Symmetry-transformed module pack (renamed, dualized, or fractally replicated).
Ξ×module\_packs.use: Build families of equivalent or self-similar modules and libraries.

Ξ internal.Ξ\_dual: Involutive or quasi-involutive on many subspaces: Ξ\_dual^2 ≈ identity.
Ξ internal.Ξ\_fractal: Scale and index lifting operator: module → tower of modules.

Global Meta-Symmetry Grid.use: Classify and index all allowed meta-symmetries of IGSOA.
